```{r}
library(knitr)
an=read.table("C:\\Users\\tsr\\Desktop\\2222\\答案.txt")
test=read.table("C:\\Users\\tsr\\Desktop\\2222\\實作.txt")
test[,1]=as.character(test[,1])
test1=rep("E",80)
test1[1:length(test[,1])]=test[,1]
num=c(1:80)
a1=an[!(an[,1]==test1),1]
a2=test1[!(an[,1]==test1)]
a3=data.frame(a1,a2)
colnames(a3)=c("正確答案","你的答案")
rownames(a3)=num[!(an[,1]==test1)]
kable(a3,caption = "字彙")

```


```{r}
an=read.table("C:\\Users\\tsr\\Desktop\\2222\\填空答案.txt")
test=read.table("C:\\Users\\tsr\\Desktop\\2222\\填空實作.txt")
pp=letters[1:10]
pp=toupper(pp)
name=c()
ind=c(4,4,5,4,4,4,5,5,5,4)
for (i in 1:10){
  dd=paste(pp[i],1:ind[i],sep="")
  name=c(name,dd)
}
an[,2]=name
test[,1]=as.character(test[,1])
test1=rep("E",44)
test1[1:length(test[,1])]=test[,1]
a1=an[!(an[,1]==test1),2]
a2=an[!(an[,1]==test1),1]
a4=test1[!(an[,1]==test1)]
a3=data.frame(a2,a4)
rownames(a3)=a1
colnames(a3)=c("正確答案","你的答案")
kable(a3,caption = "填空")
```


```{r}
an=read.table("C:\\Users\\tsr\\Desktop\\2222\\閱讀答案.txt")

}
an[,2]=name

test1=rep("E",42)
test1[1:length(test[,1])]=test[,1]
```
